entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers at times heavy. Freezing rain near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
